entities.createSql: CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS `${TABLE_NAME}` (`pokemon_id` INTEGER NOT NULL, `pokemon_name` TEXT NOT NULL, `pokemon_photo` TEXT, PRIMARY KEY(`pokemon_id`))
